PlayStation 3 emulators require official PlayStation 3 firmware available for download from an official Sony website.

## How to obtain PS3 firmware

PlayStation 3 emulators require official PlayStation 3 firmware available for download from an official Sony website. Official PS3 firmware download:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/support/hardware/ps3/system-software

## RPCS3

Quickstart guide:
https://rpcs3.net/quickstart#dumping_procedure

## About RPCS3

Website offers a compatibility search utility for determining if a game can run as well as additional metadata and links to a wiki.

https://rpcs3.net/compatibility

RPCS3 can only read from a few models of optical drives.
